explanation: [0-0] In a crude pigsty with a rough cement floor, two robots are standing, and a smaller black pig and a larger black pig are lying down.

[0-4] First, the robot on the left stops chasing and stands still, while the robot on the right continues to chase the big black pig. The big black pig runs down to avoid the robot's pursuit, then turns left and runs upward. At this time, the robot standing still takes a big step to the left and grabs the tail of the big black pig.

[4-9] Then, the robot grabbing the tail of the big black pig takes a step forward, drags the pig's ear to the ground, and the other robot walks over, while the small black pig next to it is also struggling. The robot steps on the upper body of the big black pig with both feet and controls the big black pig. The picture freezes.
